name: ORS Scheduled Faith Related Activities for a Date Range
description:
Please use the Scheduled Activities for a date range with Input Controls, located within this Activites Folder.
THIS REPORT HAS BEEN REMOVED DUE TO A NATIONAL CHANGE IN RECORDING CHAPEL/FAITH RELATED ACTIVITES WITH NOMIS.

dataset.name: Faith Activities
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION FROM OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WHERE (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS')) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS')) AND NOT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION IS NULL AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT DESCRIPTION FROM dataset_base_)

errors.error: Report Variant 174478.RS does not have corresponding dataset undefined
